name: Cute Critter CARNAGE
description:
The adorable rage-game 

Cute Critter CARNAGE is a platformer game where you (and your friends) help Pocky and her friends recover her lost egg.

Don't let the cute appearance and story fool you! The game is designed to be quite challenging for people that are fans of the genre. Conquer narrow but fair platforms, avoid mean but predictable traps. 

The game can be quite tiresome as Pocky and her friends have to overtake 40 levels across 8 chapters! Don't forget to take breaks between two nervous breakdowns, as the game has autosave features.

Who said parenting is easy??

Source code: https://github.com/atka66/cccc

The game is completely free of charge (and will always be), but if you feel like supporting me you can buy me a coffee at Ko-fi.
